webscript.description: Post a configuration with this format. { "name": configurationName, "description": configurationDescription, "nodeid": (optional) noderef ID // if provided, server considers this an update, "products": (optional) [ // list of products to be generated (should not be intermingled with snapshots) productId, ... ], "snapshots": (optional) [ // list of snapshots to be included (should not be intermingled with products) snapshotId, ... ] }
